org.fxyz3d.tools

Class NormalMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.image.Image
      • javafx.scene.image.WritableImage
        • org.fxyz3d.tools.NormalMap

  • public class NormalMap
extends javafx.scene.image.WritableImage
    Class represent a Normal Map Image. When it comes to Scaling think of intensity as the Macro, and intensity scale as the micro Also if you recieve a lot of "Bright" pixeling viewing object from the side, Apply a SMALL amount of blur to the Image PRIOR to creating this Image. It should help smooth things out.
